title: NN/g’s Free UX Templates and Guides
description: Use this curated set of free NN/g templates and guides for inspiration and to accelerate your product development activities and UX career.
author: Anna Kaley
excerpt: Use this curated set of free NN/g templates and guides for inspiration and to accelerate your product development activities and UX career.
text: Summary:  Use this curated set of free NN/g templates and guides for inspiration and to accelerate your product development activities and UX career. To help you overcome creative blocks and speed up your process, we've curated a collection of free NN/g templates and guides for UX work and product development. All templates accompany NN/g articles on related topics. The links below take you to these articles; templates are available as downloadable files on each article’s page or directly from the links in each section. Templates for Discovery and UX Research Workshop and Facilitation Templates UX-Mapping Templates Content and UI Design Templates Templates for Team Structures and Roles UX Resume and Interview Templates Have a New UX Template Idea? Let Us Know! Templates for Discovery and UX Research Use these templates for efficient UX research operations and discovery projects. They can help with outlining research questions, gathering informed consent, and identifying needs, so you can focus on impactful research insights instead of repetitive tasks. Article Description Link to Template Research with AI Cheat Sheet 5-steps for crafting AI prompts to generate research questions, methods, and recruiting criteria AI-Cheat Sheet (PDF) A Guide to Using User-Experience Research Methods How to choose the right research methods in product development UX Research Methods Guide (PDF) UX Expert Reviews How to decide whether to do a design critique, expert design review, or usability test and how often Expert Review Guide (PDF) How to Conduct a Heuristic Evaluation Step-by-step instructions for reviewing a product or experience to uncover usability issues Heuristic Review Workbook (PDF) Obtaining Consent for User Research Consent-form example that is a starting point to gather informed consent from participants in your user-research studies Example Consent Form (PDF) 27 Tips and Tricks for Conducting Successful User Research in the Field Important tasks to do before, during, and after conducting UX field research Field Research Tips Poster (PDF) Stakeholder Interviews 101 Introductions and questions for stakeholder-interview guides Stakeholder Interview Guide (HTML) Stakeholder Analysis for UX Projects Stakeholder map for identifying and involving key stakeholders in UX projects Stakeholder Mapping Template (Excel) Writing an Effective Guide for a UX Interview Example of a semistructured interview script to help you quickly create your own user-interview guides Example Interview Guide (PDF) Usability Testing 101 Summary of important details about qualitative usability testing, including its purpose, benefits, and tips for successful sessions Usability Testing Poster (PDF) Tools for Unmoderated Usability Testing Feature comparison of 15 different remote usability-testing tools. Use this guide to evaluate and choose the right ones Unmoderated Testing Tools Comparison (Excel) Checklist for Moderating a Usability Test Customizable template for facilitating and moderating a usability test Example Facilitator Guide (PDF) Observer Guidelines for Usability Research Replicable list of guidelines to help set expectations for how usability test observers should behave and take notes during sessions Research Observer Guidelines (HTML) Script and Template for Running a Card Sorting Study Customizable template with an introduction script, steps, and follow-up questions to ask users during a card sorting study.  Card Sorting Study Script and Template (PDF) Workshop and Facilitation Templates The templates and guides in this section offer practical tools for planning and running effective workshops. Use them to structure sessions, engage participants, and set clear goals, so you can focus on convergence and collaboration, without the hassle of starting from scratch. Article Description Link to Template Workshop Facilitation 101 Poster with details about workshop facilitation, including principles, facilitator goals, and tools for successful workshops Workshop Facilitation Poster (PDF) 5 UX Workshops and When to Use Them: A Cheat Sheet Five types of workshops, what they involve, and how to use each approach effectively 5 Types of UX Workshops Cheat Sheet (PDF) Foundational UX Workshop Activities The goals, participants, and timing for seven key workshop activities 7 UX Workshop Activities Poster (PDF) UX Workshops vs. Meetings: What's the Difference? Workshop-planning template to align your agenda with your goals Workshop Brief Template (PDF) Infographic highlighting the differences between meetings and workshops Workshops vs. Meetings Infographic (PDF) CSD Matrix: Framework and Template for Shared Understanding Template to collaboratively outline what you know, don't yet know, and are unsure about in a project CSD Matrix Template (Excel) CSD Matrix Template (Miro) A Guide to Service-Blueprinting Workshops Checklist of tasks to do before, during, and after a service-blueprinting workshop Service Blueprinting Workshop Checklist (PDF) How to Conduct a Cognitive-Walkthrough Workshop A template for conducting a cognitive walkthrough to evaluate system learnability Cognitive Walkthrough Template (PDF) UX-Mapping Templates Don’t waste time and energy aimlessly staring into the void of a blank canvas. Use our pre-made mapping templates to surface user needs, interactions, and internal processes to spot pain points and find opportunities for improvement. Article Description Link to Template Building Interactive UX Maps 7-step process guide for building interactive journey maps and service blueprints in Figma Process Guide for Interactive Maps (PDF) Empathy Mapping: The First Step in Design Thinking Poster summarizing  the definition, purpose, and sections of empathy maps Empathy Mapping Poster (PDF) Journey Mapping 101 Templates for creating a customer-journey map Journey Mapping Template (PDF) Journey Mapping for Remote Teams: A Digital Template Templates for collaborative customer-journey mapping Collaborative Journey Map Template (Excel) Collaborative Journey Map Template (Numbers) Service Blueprinting: A Digital Template Templates for creating a service blueprint Service Blueprint Template (Excel) Service Blueprint Template (Numbers) Storyboards Help Visualize UX Ideas Storyboard template for future-state planning and idea visualization Storyboard Template (PDF) Content and UI Design Templates Use these resources to evaluate, build, refine, and critique your content and UI designs. Focus on delivering quality, scalable designs instead of reinventing the wheel every time. Article Description Link to Template Content Inventory and Auditing 101 Template for evaluating your content's quantity and quality to update or retire it Content Audit Template (Excel) CARE: Structure for Crafting AI Prompts How to structure your generative-AI prompts to generate initial copy (Great for replacing Lorem Ipsum in designs!) CAREful AI Prompts Poster (PDF) 5 Principles of Visual Design in UX The importance of scale, hierarchy, balance, contrast, and Gestalt principles in visual design for UX Visual Design Principles Poster (PDF) The 4 Stages of AI Image Generation: An Experience Map Experience map with tips and steps for effectively using AI to generate images for your initial design work AI Image Generation Map (PDF) Paper Prototyping: A Cutout Kit Printable starter kit for paper prototyping to accelerate quick testing of low-fidelity designs Paper Prototyping Cutout Kit (PDF) Menu-Design Checklist: 17 UX Guidelines Checklist for designing navigation menus Menu-Design Checklist (PDF) An Error Messages Scoring Rubric Scorecard to evaluate and improve the clarity and effectiveness of error messages based on usability best practices Error Messages Scoring Rubric (Excel) Hostile Patterns in Error Messages Poster with 4 tips for avoiding hostile patterns in error messages Avoiding Hostile Patterns Poster (PDF) Design Critiques: Encourage a Positive Culture to Improve Products Cheat sheet for how to run a successful design critique and give good feedback UX Design Critiques Cheat Sheet (PDF) Templates for Team Structures and Roles These templates offer frameworks for creating effective team structures and clarifying roles in product development to avoid redundant or overlapping work. Use them to organize your team based on team-members’ strengths and to enhance UX skills. Article Description Link to Template DesignOps: 5 Common Team Structures How to define and visualize different team structures for DesignOps DesignOps Team Structures Guide (PDF) Setting UX Roles and Responsibilities in Product Development: The RACI Template Template for a RACI matrix to clarify roles and responsibilities in product development RACI Matrix Template (Excel) RACI Matrix Template (Numbers) Skill Mapping: A Digital Template for Remote Teams Template for evaluating UX teams’ skills and generating radar charts to visualize strengths and training opportunities Skill Mapping Template (Excel) UX Resume and Interview Templates Use these tools for everything from creating polished resumes to organizing the internal UX-interview process. Article Description Link to Template Effective Resumes for UX Students and Graduates Resume templates for students or recent graduates UX Resume Template - Student or Graduate (PDF) UX Resume Template - Student or Graduate (Word) Hiring Interviews Are Terrible: Smart UX Teams Structure Them Template for objectively structuring UX interviews and hiring Hiring Interview Analysis Template (Excel) Have a New UX Template Idea? Let Us Know! Want to suggest a new UX template or guide for the NN/g team to create and share? Email us with your idea.
html:
Summary:  Use this curated set of free NN/g templates and guides for inspiration and to accelerate your product development activities and UX career.

To help you overcome creative blocks and speed up your process, we've curated a collection of free NN/g templates and guides for UX work and product development.

All templates accompany NN/g articles on related topics. The links below take you to these articles; templates are available as downloadable files on each article’s page or directly from the links in each section.

  • Templates for Discovery and UX Research
  • Workshop and Facilitation Templates
  • UX-Mapping Templates
  • Content and UI Design Templates
  • Templates for Team Structures and Roles
  • UX Resume and Interview Templates
  • Have a New UX Template Idea? Let Us Know!

Templates for Discovery and UX Research

Use these templates for efficient UX research operations and discovery projects. They can help with outlining research questions, gathering informed consent, and identifying needs, so you can focus on impactful research insights instead of repetitive tasks.

Article

Description

Link to Template

Research with AI Cheat Sheet

5-steps for crafting AI prompts to generate research questions, methods, and recruiting criteria

AI-Cheat Sheet (PDF)

A Guide to Using User-Experience Research Methods

How to choose the right research methods in product development

UX Research Methods Guide (PDF)

UX Expert Reviews

How to decide whether to do a design critique, expert design review, or usability test and how often

Expert Review Guide (PDF)

How to Conduct a Heuristic Evaluation

Step-by-step instructions for reviewing a product or experience to uncover usability issues

Heuristic Review Workbook (PDF)

Obtaining Consent for User Research

Consent-form example that is a starting point to gather informed consent from participants in your user-research studies

Example Consent Form (PDF)

27 Tips and Tricks for Conducting Successful User Research in the Field

Important tasks to do before, during, and after conducting UX field research

Field Research Tips Poster (PDF)

Stakeholder Interviews 101

Introductions and questions for stakeholder-interview guides

Stakeholder Interview Guide (HTML)

Stakeholder Analysis for UX Projects

Stakeholder map for identifying and involving key stakeholders in UX projects

Stakeholder Mapping Template (Excel)

Writing an Effective Guide for a UX Interview

Example of a semistructured interview script to help you quickly create your own user-interview guides

Example Interview Guide (PDF)

Usability Testing 101

Summary of important details about qualitative usability testing, including its purpose, benefits, and tips for successful sessions

Usability Testing Poster (PDF)

Tools for Unmoderated Usability Testing

Feature comparison of 15 different remote usability-testing tools. Use this guide to evaluate and choose the right ones

Unmoderated Testing Tools Comparison (Excel)

Checklist for Moderating a Usability Test

Customizable template for facilitating and moderating a usability test

Example Facilitator Guide (PDF)

Observer Guidelines for Usability Research

Replicable list of guidelines to help set expectations for how usability test observers should behave and take notes during sessions

Research Observer Guidelines (HTML)

Script and Template for Running a Card Sorting Study

Customizable template with an introduction script, steps, and follow-up questions to ask users during a card sorting study. 

Card Sorting Study Script and Template (PDF)

Workshop and Facilitation Templates

The templates and guides in this section offer practical tools for planning and running effective workshops. Use them to structure sessions, engage participants, and set clear goals, so you can focus on convergence and collaboration, without the hassle of starting from scratch.

Article

Description

Link to Template

Workshop Facilitation 101

Poster with details about workshop facilitation, including principles, facilitator goals, and tools for successful workshops

Workshop Facilitation Poster (PDF)

5 UX Workshops and When to Use Them: A Cheat Sheet

Five types of workshops, what they involve, and how to use each approach effectively

5 Types of UX Workshops Cheat Sheet (PDF)

Foundational UX Workshop Activities

The goals, participants, and timing for seven key workshop activities

7 UX Workshop Activities Poster (PDF)
UX Workshops vs. Meetings: What's the Difference?

Workshop-planning template to align your agenda with your goals

Workshop Brief Template (PDF)

Infographic highlighting the differences between meetings and workshops

Workshops vs. Meetings Infographic (PDF)
CSD Matrix: Framework and Template for Shared Understanding

Template to collaboratively outline what you know, don't yet know, and are unsure about in a project

CSD Matrix Template (Excel)

CSD Matrix Template (Miro)
A Guide to Service-Blueprinting Workshops

Checklist of tasks to do before, during, and after a service-blueprinting workshop

Service Blueprinting Workshop Checklist (PDF)
How to Conduct a Cognitive-Walkthrough Workshop

A template for conducting a cognitive walkthrough to evaluate system learnability

Cognitive Walkthrough Template (PDF)

UX-Mapping Templates

Don’t waste time and energy aimlessly staring into the void of a blank canvas. Use our pre-made mapping templates to surface user needs, interactions, and internal processes to spot pain points and find opportunities for improvement.

Article

Description

Link to Template

Building Interactive UX Maps

7-step process guide for building interactive journey maps and service blueprints in Figma

Process Guide for Interactive Maps (PDF)

Empathy Mapping: The First Step in Design Thinking

Poster summarizing  the definition, purpose, and sections of empathy maps

Empathy Mapping Poster (PDF)

Journey Mapping 101

Templates for creating a customer-journey map

Journey Mapping Template (PDF)

Journey Mapping for Remote Teams: A Digital Template

Templates for collaborative customer-journey mapping

Collaborative Journey Map Template (Excel)

Collaborative Journey Map Template (Numbers)

Service Blueprinting: A Digital Template

Templates for creating a service blueprint

Service Blueprint Template (Excel)

Service Blueprint Template (Numbers)

Storyboards Help Visualize UX Ideas

Storyboard template for future-state planning and idea visualization

Storyboard Template (PDF)

Content and UI Design Templates

Use these resources to evaluate, build, refine, and critique your content and UI designs. Focus on delivering quality, scalable designs instead of reinventing the wheel every time.

Article

Description

Link to Template

Content Inventory and Auditing 101

Template for evaluating your content's quantity and quality to update or retire it

Content Audit Template (Excel)

CARE: Structure for Crafting AI Prompts

How to structure your generative-AI prompts to generate initial copy (Great for replacing Lorem Ipsum in designs!)

CAREful AI Prompts Poster (PDF)

5 Principles of Visual Design in UX

The importance of scale, hierarchy, balance, contrast, and Gestalt principles in visual design for UX

Visual Design Principles Poster (PDF)

The 4 Stages of AI Image Generation: An Experience Map

Experience map with tips and steps for effectively using AI to generate images for your initial design work

AI Image Generation Map (PDF)

Paper Prototyping: A Cutout Kit

Printable starter kit for paper prototyping to accelerate quick testing of low-fidelity designs

Paper Prototyping Cutout Kit (PDF)

Menu-Design Checklist: 17 UX Guidelines

Checklist for designing navigation menus

Menu-Design Checklist (PDF)

An Error Messages Scoring Rubric

Scorecard to evaluate and improve the clarity and effectiveness of error messages based on usability best practices

Error Messages Scoring Rubric (Excel)

Hostile Patterns in Error Messages

Poster with 4 tips for avoiding hostile patterns in error messages

Avoiding Hostile Patterns Poster (PDF)

Design Critiques: Encourage a Positive Culture to Improve Products

Cheat sheet for how to run a successful design critique and give good feedback

UX Design Critiques Cheat Sheet (PDF)

Templates for Team Structures and Roles

These templates offer frameworks for creating effective team structures and clarifying roles in product development to avoid redundant or overlapping work. Use them to organize your team based on team-members’ strengths and to enhance UX skills.

Article

Description

Link to Template

DesignOps: 5 Common Team Structures

How to define and visualize different team structures for DesignOps

DesignOps Team Structures Guide (PDF)

Setting UX Roles and Responsibilities in Product Development: The RACI Template

Template for a RACI matrix to clarify roles and responsibilities in product development

RACI Matrix Template (Excel)

RACI Matrix Template (Numbers)

Skill Mapping: A Digital Template for Remote Teams

Template for evaluating UX teams’ skills and generating radar charts to visualize strengths and training opportunities

Skill Mapping Template (Excel)

UX Resume and Interview Templates

Use these tools for everything from creating polished resumes to organizing the internal UX-interview process.

Article

Description

Link to Template

Effective Resumes for UX Students and Graduates

Resume templates for students or recent graduates

UX Resume Template - Student or Graduate (PDF)

UX Resume Template - Student or Graduate (Word)

Hiring Interviews Are Terrible: Smart UX Teams Structure Them

Template for objectively structuring UX interviews and hiring

Hiring Interview Analysis Template (Excel)

Have a New UX Template Idea? Let Us Know!

Want to suggest a new UX template or guide for the NN/g team to create and share? Email us with your idea.
